page.title: 05 A Modern House on an Estate
page.content: This house is a 3 bedroomed, brick built, semi detached house on an estate. It is double glazed, has cavity wall insulation, is carpeted throughout and is well maintained. {Living Room:}brown suite, T.V., gas fire, table, shelving, units, stereo. {Kitchen:}washer, freezer, units, table and chairs, cooker, various utensils, radio, T.V., flourescent lighting. {Hall:}hanging plants, pram, phone, drawers, mirror, coats and shoes. {Stairs/Landing:}wall heater, linen basket. {Bedroom 1:}double bed, douvet, wardrobe, drawers, T.V., clock radio, green decor. {Bedrooms 2 and 3:}both small rooms, 3 single beds, douvets, drawers. {Bathroom:}white suite, fan, blind, mirror, cupboards.
